edu.cscc.javaadventure

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cscc.javaadventure.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a location in the JavaAdventure game. While it is called "Room" it can represent any location, whether it is inside, outside, or in some other realm. Rooms have a name, description, and contents. They are also connected to other rooms, and may be navigated through. Using the directions: "UP", "DOWN", "NORTH", "SOUTH", "EAST", "WEST" players can navigate between rooms.

      • connectRoom

        public void connectRoom(java.lang.String direction,
                        Room room)
        Connect the current Room to another Room in the given direction. Connecting this Room causes the other Room to be connected in the opposite direction.
        Parameters:
        direction - One of the direction constants.
        room - Another Room object.

      • getRoom

        public Room getRoom(java.lang.String direction)
        Return the Room connected in the indicated direction or null if no Room exists in that direction.
        Parameters:
        direction - One of the direction constants on this class.
        Returns:
        The Room connected in the direction or null.
